snippet: At a speech on Wednesday, Vikram S. Pandit, the chief executive of Citigroup, championed an idea that most Wall Street titans would shun: regulation is good.
abstract: At a speech on Wednesday, Vikram S. Pandit, the chief executive of Citigroup, championed an idea that most Wall Street titans would shun: regulation is good.

headline.main: Citigroup's Pandit Shows Love for Dodd-Frank
